name: Expense/Income
notes: Book income or expense for instruments or transactions in the system
display_expr: 'Income/Expense: '+str(purpose)+', Instrument: '+transactions[0].instrument.short_name+', Amount: '+format_number(transactions[0].cash_consideration, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' '+transactions[0].settlement_currency.user_code+' in '+transactions[0].portfolio.user_code

actions.condition_expr: (purpose=='Custody fee' or purpose=='Admin fee' or purpose=='Management fee' or purpose=='Tax') and (reverse=='-')
(purpose=='Commission' or purpose=='Custody fee' or purpose=='Admin fee' or purpose=='Management fee' or purpose=='Tax' or purpose=='Other expense') and (reverse=='Reverse')
